column1: Sakhipur (Bengali: সখিপুর) is a town of Sakhipur Upazila
column3: Bangladesh. The town is situated 36 km east of Tangail city and 77 km northwest of Dhaka city

column1: According to Population Census 2011 performed by Bangladesh Bureau of Statistics
column2: The total population of Sakhipur town is 30028. There are 7473 households in total.

column1: The literacy rate of Sakhipur town is 57.6% (Male-59.8%
